name: The Star Vorage Series: Star Voyage 1 + Star Voyage 2
overview: The Star Voyages are two part electronic mini-novels, in which you play the role of Captain Karl Turk of the Starship Venture. The Star Voyages are more than the usual "take object" adventure. They are original short stories written by the author. In part 1, you are introduced to your crew and have the opportunity to familiarize yourself with the Venture. Unexpectedly, a mysterious asteroid is discovered. You must prepare to investigate. In part 2, you discover a race of alien humanoids, who are outcasts of their own civilization. You soon learn of an evil race of huge aliens referred to as "the others". You then must prepare yourself for the inevitable clash of your two cultures!
